thread.title: Bolstered by polls, Team Trump attacks Clinton, says Americans understand illegal immigration plan
thread.title_full: Bolstered by polls, Team Trump attacks Clinton, says Americans understand illegal immigration plan | Fox News

author: jabagom
text:
I understand trump's immigration policy 

1. Make illegal immigrants as the biggest scapegoat in the long list of scapegoats
2. Spend more than $25 BILLION dollars on a wall
3 Spend tens of billions of dollars to round up 11 Million illegal immigrants
4. Have absolutely no plan on how to fund these bondoogles

trump will create millions of new jobs .... all paid by our taxes 
oh, and the rich will get GW Bush style tax cuts to make them richer

I understand trump's plan and I'm not buying it

My vote will not be used on trump!!!
